fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Nocturne's Curtain Call__
BiS. Increases HP, Lunar Damage, CRIT DMG and gives Energy in one weapon.

__Prototype Amber__
Allows her to provide healing, especially valuable in Nefer teams.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Sacrificial Jade__
Battle Pass Weapon increasing EM and HP with CRIT Rate.

__Favonius Codex__
Provides Energy for the entire team.

__Widsith__
Only worth building for the CRIT DMG and the possibility of having EM.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP% or Energy Recharge%|<goblet> HP%|<circlet> CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Eternal Tides
**2)** Elemental Burst: Moonlit Melancholy
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Moondew Cascade

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: __Deepwood Memories__ in Nefer Teams or __Tenacity of the Millieth__ in ATK% scaling DPS Teams do also work.
